tactic: destruct list_pick with (X:=bool) (ll:=lb) (k:=1) as [[z [l1 [l2 [H1 H2]]]]|[H1 H2]].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: destruct list_pick with (X:=bool) (ll:=lb) (k:=1) as [[z [l1 [l2 [H1 H2]]]]|[H1 H2]]. - left. exists z. exists l1. rewrite H1. auto. - right. exists 1. rewrite H1. auto.
